title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
Quick rationale for using Quarto as a solution for blogging. Since there are so many high quality solutions to writing a web blog, I think it good to give a quick explanation of why Quarto is so amazing for scientificy and technical blogging!
First of all, the ease of use of Quarto is simply unbeatable. Designed with scientific writing in mind, it seamlessly integrates with and renders everything from markdown files (including inline code), Jupyter Notebooks, etc to beautiful HTML pages.

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


x = np.linspace(0, 2 * np.pi, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.plot(x, y)
